duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for administration, monitoring, and supporting all aspects of the UNIX and Linux infrastructure.
Identify and proactively respond to medium to high complexity system problems.
Troubleshoot and correct complex, ambiguous problems affecting the operation of the environment.
Analyze current processes and procedures for possible improvements and develop and maintain documentation of the assigned environment.
Architect, implement, and support infrastructure and technologies.
Understand the internal/external customer technologies and problem resolution techniques.

skills.skill: Satellite or similar Linux management platforms
CUPS or similar Enterprise printing environments
Nagios or similar systems for monitoring UNIX and Linux environments
Enterprise-wide UNIX infrastructure and interoperating with Windows and other platforms
Setup and support for server deployment
Knowledge of Applications and Databases hosted on Linux environments such as Oracle, ERP, etc.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent work experience in a related field required.
7+ years’ experience with UNIX and Linux technologies.
Experience with AIX or iSeries is a plus.
Knowledge of Applications and Databases hosted on Linux environments, such as Oracle, ERP, etc., preferred.
